kvhc.util.db

Class SoundDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • kvhc.util.db.SoundDataSource

  • public class SoundDataSource
extends java.lang.Object
    DAO for Sound model. CRUD interface.
    Author:
    kvhc

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SoundDataSource(Context context)
      Default Constructor, needs the context to be able to use the database.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the database connection, which means that no database transactions can take place.
      void deleteSound(Sound sound)
      Deletes a sound from the database.
      java.util.List<Sound> getAllSounds()
      Creates a list of all the sounds in the database.
      Sound getSoundFromKey(long soundId)
      Get a Sound based on the Sound ID.
      void open()
      Opens the database for transactions.
      void save(Sound sound)
      Saves a sound to the database, if the sound doesn't have an id, it will create and id for it and set it.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Default Constructor, needs the context to be able to use the database.

    • Method Detail

      • open

        public void open()
          throws SQLException
        Opens the database for transactions.
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the database connection, which means that no database transactions can take place.

      • deleteSound

        public void deleteSound(Sound sound)
        Deletes a sound from the database.
        Parameters:
        sound - Sound to be deleted.

      • getAllSounds

        public java.util.List<Sound> getAllSounds()
        Creates a list of all the sounds in the database.
        Returns:
        A list of all the sounds in the database.

      • getSoundFromKey

        public Sound getSoundFromKey(long soundId)
        Get a Sound based on the Sound ID.
        Parameters:
        soundId - The ID of the sound.
        Returns:
        The Sound with the id soundId.

      • save

        public void save(Sound sound)
        Saves a sound to the database, if the sound doesn't have an id, it will create and id for it and set it.
        Parameters:
        sound - Sound to save to the database
